General.Name: Weblink International Inc
General.Description: Weblink International, Inc. distributes and sells software and information technology products in Taiwan. It provides commercial and home information electronics, application software products, digital entertainment products, system integration, SMBs solution, home appliances, and lifestyle products. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan. Weblink International, Inc. is a subsidiary of Acer Incorporated.
